entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 90 to 120 mm of rain. Peak rates of 10 to 20 mm/h expected from late Thursday afternoon. Thunderstorms possible. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Low. Changes: Upgraded to Orange Rain Warning.

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 130 to 180 mm of rain about the main divide, and 70 to 100 mm within 15 farther east. Peak rates of 15 to 25 mm/h expected from late morning about the divide. Thunderstorms possible. Freezing level 2500 metres. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Low. Changes: Upgraded to Orange Rain Warning.
